metadata.Title: CVE-2019-9076 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - low.
metadata.Description: An issue was discovered in the Binary File Descriptor (BFD) library (aka libbfd), as distributed in GNU Binutils 2.32. It is an attempted excessive memory allocation in elf_read_notes in elf.c.

notes.Note: sbeattie> upstream marked this as wontfix, due to binutils reporting a failed to allocate error mdeslaur> disputed by upstream, marking as ignored

criterions.comment: binutils: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
